title: Sussur Greatsword
content:
it.

Sussur roots extend from this sword's hilt into the blade itself. It yearns to drink magic, silencing every creature it strikes.

Sussur Greatsword Information

Grants a +1 enhancement bonus. Apply Silenced on impact.

Sussur Greatsword Location & Where to Find

Location: Blighted Village Quest: Finish the Masterwork weapon

Sussur Greatsword Notes & Tips

Rarity: Rare Value: 150 Weight: 3 ID: FOR_IncompleteMasterwork_SussurGreatsword

Weapons Adamantine Longsword ♦ Adamantine Mace ♦ Adaman
